did-you-know-description: Most cravings fade in about 20 minutes. A little space and hydration help your brain shift from automatic to intentional.
manage-urges-description:
You don't manage urges with 
 willpower. You manage them with 
 <0>awareness, pause, and choice.</0>
box-breathing-description: A 3-minute breathing exercise to calm your nervous system and reduce the urge.
self-hypnosis-description: 3-5 minute audio session to reinforce your intentions and engage your unconscious mind.
quick-writing-description: A freestyle space to write everything you're feeling and let your thoughts flow onto the page.
